description: Accelo is a cloud-based platform designed to streamline operations for service businesses by integrating project management, CRM, and billing functionalities into one unified system.
name: accelo
title: Accelo

properties.description: Actual deployment identifier or name to target a specific deployment within the Accelo platform.
properties.name: deployment
properties.label: Deployment

properties.description: A contact phone number for the company.
properties.name: phone
properties.label: Phone

properties.description: Any comments or notes made against the company.
properties.name: comments
properties.label: Comments

properties.description: The first name of the contact.
properties.name: firstname
properties.label: First Name

properties.description: The last name of the contact.
properties.name: surname
properties.label: Last Name

properties.description: ID of the company  to which the newly affiliated contact will be linked.
properties.name: company_id
properties.label: Company ID

properties.description: The contact's phone number in their role in the associated company.
properties.name: phone
properties.label: Phone

properties.description: The contact's position in the associated company.
properties.name: email
properties.label: Email

properties.description: The type of object the task is against.
properties.name: against_type
properties.label: Against Type

properties.description: ID of the object the task is against.
properties.name: against_id
properties.label: Against Object ID

properties.description: The date the task is is scheduled to start.
properties.name: date_started
properties.label: Start Date
